title: Kapernabou/Kafr Nabo
description: An ancient place, located in modern Syria, with remains of an ancient church and residential buildings. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2011 as part of the "Ancient Villages of Northern Syria."

properties.description: Location of the ruins of the ancient church at Kafr Nabo. Coordinates determined by eye in Google Earth in October 2012, following description in UNESCO World Heritage List.
properties.title: Ruins of ancient church at Kafr Nabo
